Trinkets

Bracers, armbands, manacles etc.

This slot covers all things that would cover your wrists. Essentially bracers and possibly some bracelets. They can be enchanted randomly with one of the Clothing enhancements or be one of the named drops found below.

  • Magical Efficiency 5%Magical Efficiency 5%: You take a 5% Enhancement discount to the Spell Point cost of your spells.
  • Shield +8Shield +8: While this item is equipped, you are partially protected by a field of magical force which can deflect enemy attacks. This item provides a +8 Shield bonus to Armor Class. It does not stack with an equipped shield.
